item.schmucks.magic.tooltip: Holy crap! I-it's pure freakin' magic!
item.schmucks.dead_schmuck.tooltip: Doesn't look like it's coming back anytime soon
gui.schmucks.control_wand.title: Wand of Control
gui.schmucks.control_wand.start_all.tool: Allows Schmucks to move, and do tasks.
gui.schmucks.control_wand.stop_all.toolt: Disallows Schmucks to move, and do tasks.
Disallows Schmucks to teleport to you. Useful if they are annoying.
gui.schmucks.control_wand.start_teleport: Allows Schmucks to teleport to you past a certain distance.
gui.schmucks.control_wand.stop_follow.to: Makes Schmucks stop following you completely.
gui.schmucks.control_wand.stop_attacking: Makes Schmucks stop attacking their current target.
gui.schmucks.control_wand.all_no_tool: Apply to all without an item
gui.schmucks.control_wand.all_but_this: Apply to all but this one
gui.schmucks.control_wand.apply_same_too: Apply to all with this item
gui.schmucks.control_wand.all_but_same_t: Apply to all but this item
text.autoconfig.schmucks.title: Schmucks
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.chaosMod: All Schmucks will be incredibly short tempered - attacking teammates when provoked.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.wandRang: Range of the Wand of Control (in blocks)
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.shortTem: The chance for a Schmuck to be short tempered, [0-1]
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.leatherH: The chance for a Schmuck to have a leather helmet equipped, [0-1]
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.jobRange: How far away a Schmuck can look for a job; reduce if you get frequent lag spikes or low TPS.
This can and will destroy any server/your computer at >16. Be aware.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.jobInter: How often a Schmuck looks for their job block. Does not apply to miners.
Minimum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for a job.
Maximum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for a job.
text.autoconfig.schmucks.option.miningIn: How often a Schmuck looks for an ore to mine.
Minimum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for an ore.
Maximum amount of ticks before a Schmuck can look for an ore.
